segments.text: This kitchen scene is heartbreaking in its carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in drying that plate, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing the sink, ruining everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows, and she stands in it, potentially slipping any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for her; she'll be devastated by the damage later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable, balanced on the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One tip and he could hurt himself badly reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up too, her innocent face full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this secrecy might lead to trouble when mom finds out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside contrasts with the impending sadness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
